original_title: Deliver Them from Evil: The Taking of Alta View
overview: A man (Rick Worthington) assaults the Alta Vista Hospital taking four women, a man and two babies as hostages. He wants to kill Dr. Garrick, who, according to Worthington, ruined his life sterilizing his wife. He threatens to detonate a bomb. Based on a true story.
title: Deliver Them from Evil: The Taking of Alta View
